name: ServerInfoHelper
description: The `ServerInfoHelper` class provides access to server information and connection details for multiplayer servers. This helper class wraps Minecraft's `ServerInfo` object and provides methods to access server name, address, player count, version information, ping, and other server-related data. ServerInfoHelper instances are typically obtained through server list operations or connection events.
overview:
The `ServerInfoHelper` class serves as a wrapper around server information, providing convenient access to:
- Server identification (name, address, connection type)
- Player information (count, player list summary)
- Server status and version details
- Network information (ping, protocol version)
- Server resources (icon, resource pack policy)
- NBT data representation

This class is particularly useful for server management scripts, server selection interfaces, and connection monitoring tools.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Gets the name of the server.

methods.name: getAddress
methods.description: Gets the address of the server.

methods.name: getPlayerCountLabel
methods.description: Gets a label representing the player count.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Gets the display label of the server.

methods.name: getPing
methods.description: Gets the ping latency to the server in milliseconds.

methods.name: getProtocolVersion
methods.description: Gets the Minecraft protocol version of the server.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Gets the human-readable version string of the server.

methods.name: getPlayerListSummary
methods.description: Gets a summary list of players currently on the server.

methods.name: resourcePackPolicy
methods.description: Gets the resource pack policy of the server.

methods.name: getIcon
methods.description: Gets the server icon (favicon) as a Base64 encoded string.

methods.name: isOnline
methods.description: Checks if the server is currently online and reachable.

methods.name: isLocal
methods.description: Checks if the server is a local (LAN) server.

methods.name: getNbt
methods.description: Gets the server's raw NBT data.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the ServerInfoHelper object.
